data.title: Truman Home of the Day of Harry S. Truman's Death
data.meta_description: The street in front of the Truman Home at 219 N. Delaware is blocked off out of respect on the day of death of former president Harry S. Truman.

Description

The street in front of the Truman Home at 219 N. Delaware is blocked off out of respect on the day of death of former president Harry S. Truman.
